EmailTemplate.description: An email is sent to the program notifying that their change of location request has been withdrawn
EmailTemplate.name: JFS COL Request Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Location Request Withdrawn for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Change of Location Request for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} was withdrawn on {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Transaction_Status_Date__c}. If you have questions about this action, contact your department representative.
To view the details of this request, log on to OCLQS. https://oclqs.force.com/oclqs_home
Select the Licensing Amendment tab under My programs screen. and then click the “Amendment Activities” sub tab
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
